events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car on a busy intersection yesterday afternoon.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the initial review of the details and keywords mentioned.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to facilitate quick handling and customer support.
Insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that processing will start soon.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates for further investigation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including the accident report, vehicle photos, and repair quotes.
Claims investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacting witnesses for testimony regarding the accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of liability and evaluation of damage costs to the vehicle.
A settlement proposal was communicated to the customer, covering repair expenses and rental vehicle reimbursement.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and appreciated the communication during the process.
Claim was officially approved and authorized for payment after customer's acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment was processed and issued to the customer's account to cover the approved vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
The entire case was archived in the system for record keeping and future reference if needed.
